actions.text: Read twice and referred jointly to the Committees on Budget; Appropriations pursuant to the order of January 30, 1975, as modified on April 11, 1986.
Senate Committees on Appropriations; Budget discharged by Unanimous Consent.

Referred jointly to the Committees on Budget; Governmental Affairs pursuant to the order of August 4, 1977, with instructions that if one committee reports, the other committee have thirty days of continuous session to report or be discharged.

official_title: A bill to amend the Impoundment Control Act of 1974 to provide for enhanced recission procedures.

summary.text: Amends the Impoundment Control Act of 1974 to effect any rescission of budget authority the President proposes unless the Congress adopts a joint resolution disapproving all or part of the rescission within 45 days after the President's message containing the proposal. Repeals provisions that prohibit funds made available for obligation by congressional veto from inclusion in subsequent rescission proposals.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Impoundment Control Act of 1974 to provide for enhanced recission procedures.
